repos_data.description: CKAN is an open-source DMS (data management system) for powering data hubs and data portals. CKAN makes it easy to publish, share and use data. It powers catalog.data.gov, open.canada.ca/data, data.humdata.org among many other sites.

Data search & enrichment library for Machine Learning â†’ Easily find and add relevant features to your ML & AI pipeline from hundreds of public and premium external data sources, including open & commercial LLMs
Cloud-native, data onboarding architecture for Google Cloud Datasets
